summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the creation of fifteen (15) new positions in the City Light Department, revising the 1995 annual budget by increasing certain expenditure allowances and decreasing others to reflect the creation of the new positions and to realize the cost savings associated with the implementation of City Light's Information Technology Strategic Plan, and affirming a commitment by City Light to abrogate 30 positions by January 1, 1996 as part of the 1996 Budget.
